Intervention.evidence: implanted with and underwent semichronic recording from the NeuroPort™ array during standard subdural electrode monitoring for epilepsy

Objective.evidence: We describe our initial surgical experience with the NeuroPort™ MEA in a series of patients undergoing subdural electrode implantation for epilepsy monitoring.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Robust and durable LFPs and single-unit recordings were obtained from all implanted individuals.

Harms.evidence: There were no neurological complications or infections associated with electrode implantation or prolonged monitoring.
